entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:58 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
